title: monkaS I just saw what happens when people don't pay their boosters (elo-boosting is BAD)
body:
Just a friendly reminder elo-boosting is bad and dumb (as well as being against the terms of agreement).

Someone was INTing top, not a big deal, at least it was the enemy for once. guy never said a word, just bought mobi boots and ran it down every lane. after I looked at the account, the guy has done this exact thing on garen or nunu in the last 15 games he has played D:! one game his poor team even managed to carry him going 1/15/2.... going back further you can even clearly see when the account was being boosted... 100% winrate, 12.0 or better KDA. disgusting.

this is a classic example of "cheaters never win". Let this serve as a reminder to those considering it... just don't.

Also, it is a damn shame this is such a prevalent issue in our game... especially this time of year when the season is close to ending....
